ygData.msgSnippet: Yggdrasil: No need to locate her, I have already. Her spark signature is brigth on my sensors. What s the plan? AzureBlade: Hmm... New faces, yet I know I can

Yggdrasil: No need to locate her, I have already. Her spark signature
is brigth on my sensors. What's the plan?

AzureBlade: Hmm... New faces, yet I know I can trust all of you. My
plan is to mine Hydras' power by entering his base and... (he stopped,
considering his options) destroying it.

Yggdrasil: That's an ambitious plan, but what about Nightlight?

AzureBlade: I can't reach her, or else Hydras will kill her. You can
try to herd her inside the base when I'll be in, but she's acting as a
Pred. She won't retreat willingly. At that point... I'll do what I
can. You'll have to hold the Preds off the base if they discover me,
and probably the Tripreds too. After they're through with the Preds,
they'll be out for you.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord:
> 
> "what's your plan, Azuresaid the amle while he landed "Have you 
> located her?"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > : : Kup : :
> > 
> > Kup drives onto the battlefield, transforming and flipping to his 
> feet. Kup ran over to Azure's position, rifle drawn.
> > 
> > Kup: No need for the commlink, lad, I'm right here. I hear you have 
> a plan?
> > 
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Windlord:
> > 
> > "I'm moving!!!!"said the male and looking to BlackFang and 
> > Ydrassil "You've heard... We haven't time and she's in danger if we 
> > wait here more time, she will be lost"
> > 
> > Winlord moved towards Azure while he opened his com link to 
> > Kup "Kup, follow my signal and open your com link in Azure's 
> > frecuency. it seems that he has a plan"
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > AzureBlade: So be it. I will personally put a price on your head. 
> > No
> > > one in the galaxy will offer you any help, not even your own 
> > mother.
> > > 
> > > He broke the communication. Things were pressing now, and bringing
> > > Nightlight  back was going to be harder, but there was still 
> hope, 
> > if
> > > the Maximals could get here fast.
> > > 
> > > AzureBlade: Windlord, get the slag here fast. I don't care how 
> many
> > > you are, but Nightlight's in great danger as we speak. Knowing 
> > Hydras,
> > > he's going to have her killed if I make any move. However, I might
> > > have a plan...
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > Hydras/Perceptor:
> > > > 
> > > > "But she rather join to her old mates than follow the commands 
> > of 
> > > > old fasioned and insane bot"replied Hydras while he spat more 
> > fire 
> > > > against the bird and flew towards Tylrael while he avanced he 
> > sent 
> > > > the follow comlink to Perceptor "Capture this bot... and be 
> > ready to 
> > > > kill you-know-who if where necesary" and this other one to 
> > > > Maxima "Be ready my precious to support Perceptor if he need... 
> > > > while he needs your assistance cover me" and replied to 
> > Azure "If I 
> > > > saw you around this battle field... I will kill her and If I 
> die 
> > in 
> > > > your hands, she will follow me... and Rodimus won't have a 
> grave 
> > to  
> > > > where he could cry her "
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Tyrael dodged the shots by flying upward and he threw two 
> > feather
> > > > > shards at Maxima and two other at Hydras.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Tyrael: A leader needs vision of both means and goals. Hydras 
> > has
> > > > > fused Megatron's deceptiveness with Galvatron's insanity! He 
> > plays
> > > > > everyone for his own personal advancement. You seem bright; 
> > you'd 
> > > > do
> > > > > well to step out of the way... That's not what Alpha Trion 
> has 
> > > > planned
> > > > > for you anyways, don't you think?
> > > > > 
> > > > > He grinned and waited for her reaction.
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> > > > > > Maxima held her rifle & aimed it at Tyrael to cover Hydras. 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > "He's more the Leader than you!" She boomed with pain in 
> her 
> > > > voice.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Then shot a couple bolts at Tyrael.
